heading: Bachelor in Computer Science
description: Currently pursuing BS degree in Computer Science, focusing on Data Science, and Machine Learning.
keyAchievements: Developed a full-stack Book Notes App that lets users search books via the Google Books API, write personal notes, rate books, and securely store everything in a MySQL database.

heading: FSc

heading: Matriculation
description: Successfully completed secondary school education, achieved strong academic performance across all subjects and building a solid foundation for future studies.
